mapper.select: SELECT eps.no, eps.compid, eps.expid, ep.expname, ep.expbizfield, ep.exptel FROM expertscrap eps, expert ep WHERE ROWNUM < 5 and compid = #{compid} and eps.expid = ep.id order by no desc

SELECT no, compid, expid, expname, expbizfield, exptel FROM (SELECT eps.no, eps.compid, eps.expid, ep.expname, ep.expbizfield, ep.exptel,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY eps.no DESC) AS RNUM FROM expertscrap eps, expert ep WHERE compid = #{compId} and eps.expid = ep.id) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageVO.start} AND #{pageVO.end} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expertscrap(no, compid, expid) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,0) FROM expertscrap), #{compid}, #{expid})
mapper.select: select count(*) from expertscrap where compId=#{compId}
select count(*) from expertscrap where expid=#{expid}
